content:
Yes, Rawalpindi has a vibrant street food scene with many delicious options to try. Here are some popular street food items in the city:

1. Gol Gappay (Pani Puri) - small crispy shells filled with chickpeas, potatoes, chilies, and a tangy tamarind water.

2. Bun Kebab - A spicy potato patty served with a bun and chutneys.

3. Chana Chaat - A spicy and tangy chickpea salad with tomatoes, onions, and a blend of spices.

4. Samosas - A deep-fried savory pastry that is filled with spiced potatoes, peas, or meat.

5. Dahi Bhalla - A dish of fried lentil dumplings soaked in yogurt and garnished with tamarind sauce and spices.

Make sure to look for vendors with a good reputation for hygiene and quality. And if you're unsure about the spice level, don't hesitate to ask for a milder version!
